resources.string: Unable to process request. Please try again.
Unable to process request due to communication failure.
Authentication failure while communicating with server.
Unable to process request temporarily. Please try after sometime.
Unable to process request due to very poor or limited connectivity.
Bad or incomplete response from server. Please try again.
Sorry, we are unable to run this application as device is on proxy server. Please remove proxy from your network.
This device is rooted. You can\'t use this app.
